about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure in the hidden object game "Unsolved Case: Fatal Clue DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This downloadable content contains new locations for each episode: search for clues in the common room, explore the auction house storage facility, visit the head’s office in a destroyed factory and check out old recordings in the sound studio!

In the new locations, you can learn new details about the characters and uncover all the secrets of the mysterious cases. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

♟️ CLUES IN THE COMMON ROOM!
Explore the room and find helpful clues that may help you solve the horrible murder!

♟️ A STORAGE FACILITY FULL OF RELICS!
There's something fishy going on in the auction house! Investigate the place and find out the truth!

♟️ A RUINED OFFICE IN A DESTROYED FACTORY!
Nobody visited the head’s office after the explosion at the factory - explore the room and look for hints!

♟️ RECORDINGS IN A SOUND STUDIO!
There are some old recordings hidden in the studio! Investigate the place and find them!

Are you ready for thrilling crime cases? Then begin your investigation, because many exciting puzzles are waiting for you!
